metadata.description:
underneath is our 3rd original release on sound.xyz. it was also the first cudos release of 2022. since it's part of our debut album we believe that it rightfully deserves to have a home on sound along with the rest of the album.

one cool aspect about underneath is that it was the first project we made for our debut album. it started out as a collab back in december 2020 with our friends Levity. after about 2-3 sessions over zoom the bulk of the production was pretty much done.

then a month later we (cudos) flew out to LA for the first time to meet some friends & work on music. during this trip we met up with Kyle Reynolds for a poke bowl lunch date. afterwards we ended up heading back to his place to write a song. we showed him underneath and he immediately loved it so we started working. within that 1-2 hr session we wrote the entire demo for underneath & not much changed about the song from that moment.

we couldn't be more grateful to have worked with these guys (Levity & Kyle) for our album. not only did the collab create a song we're super proud of but also started a great friendship with john & pj. so strong that 7 months later we started a boyband together during a writing camp in chicago. on top of that, meeting kyle & writing with him was very enlightening for us as artists. he was one of our first in person sessions & it's actually insane considering the caliber of work he's put out. we learned so much from him in that one session...

we can't thank them enough for their patience & expertise, so shout out to u guys, we love u!

lyrics.text:
Yup!

Smile and a wave say that we're doin fine
Going through the motions till we die
A little bit a just to feel alive
Don't wanna get outta bed (no!)

Kisses on the cheek and then they twist the knife
Tell me that it's unfair well that's life
Tryna hear the angel over to my right
The voice is so loud in my head

Yeah we never get too deep
We cover up our feelings
Wish we could delete them

Maybe then we'd be free
I know that it's a pipe dream
But therapy is pricey

People judgin pushin lookin down
I've seen all this shit before
Oh only if we could see
That everyone is lying
What everybody's hiding
Underneath

Yeah we never get too deep
We cover up our feelings
Wish we could delete them

Maybe then we'd be free
I know that it's a pipe dream
But therapy is pricey

Fuck a cup of coffee where's the cocktail
I know it's kinda early I don't care
They say to open up but I'm not there
So I'll just keep drinkin instead

I've been feelin lost found
I can't help but stick out
I feel like a black sheep
Stuck inside this small town (ahhh)

I wanna little more than pretty faces
Cut beneath the surface conversations

Yeah we never get too deep
We cover up our feelings
Wish we could delete them

Maybe then we'd be free
I know that it's a pipe dream
But therapy is pricey (yeah)

People judgin pushin lookin down
I've seen all this shit before
Oh only if we could see
That everyone is lying
What everybody's hiding
Underneath

Yeah we never get too deep
We cover up our feelings
Wish we could delete them

Maybe then we'd be free
I know that it's a pipe dream
But therapy is pricey (yeah)

People judgin pushin lookin down
I've seen all this shit before
Oh, only if we could see
That everyone is lying
What everybody's hiding
Underneath
